general_advisory: Keeping in view of dry and sunny weather during the next five days, farmers are advised to resume fertilizer and pesticide application, where it is required. There is a possibility of aphid outbreak in summer vegetable crops. Regular monitoring of crop field is advisable for incidence of insects and diseases. Farmers are advised to keep crop fields free from weeds and do mulching in vegetables to control weed population. Livestock should be kept under shade with provisions for sufficient clean water during the day.
